mapper.select: select noti_type, week_code, noti_hour, noti_min from NotificationSetting where user_id = #{userId} and noti_on = 1

select posting_title, posting_content from (select rownum as rnum, sub.* from (select SUBSTR(posting_title, 1, 20) as posting_title, SUBSTR(posting_content, 1, 20) as posting_content from Posting where posting_recommend > 0 and posting_time > sysdate - 1 and posting_type = #{postingType} order by posting_recommend desc ) sub ) where rnum = 1
